title: Add sample feature toggle
body:
Implement a basic feature flag system to enable or disable certain app features for testing.

### Requirements
- Add a config flag in `config/app_config.dart`.
- Default the flag to **false**.
- Log a message when toggled.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Developers can toggle feature flags easily in code.
- No runtime errors when flag is off.
- Console output confirms flag state.

title: Add placeholder homepage UI
body:
Design a simple placeholder homepage for UI testing.

### Requirements
- Create a basic layout with a header and footer.
- Include a centered welcome message.
- Use neutral colors and minimal styling.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Homepage loads without errors.
- Header/footer visible.
- Design ready for real content replacement.

title: Setup logging utility
body:
Create a small utility class to handle console and file logging.

### Requirements
- Write logs to both console and `logs/app.log`.
- Support levels: info, warn, error.
- Include timestamps.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Logs are formatted consistently.
- Errors clearly visible.
- File output verified under `/logs` folder.

title: Add unit tests for math utilities
body:
Write unit tests for all functions in `lib/utils/math_utils.dart`.

### Requirements
- Test edge cases for division by zero.
- Ensure accuracy of rounding methods.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Test coverage > 80% for math utilities.
- All tests pass in CI.

title: Document setup instructions
body:
Update the README with local development setup steps.

### Requirements
- Explain environment setup.
- Add instructions for installing dependencies.
- Include a short troubleshooting section.

### Acceptance Criteria
- README clear and easy to follow.
- New developers can start in <10 minutes.
